section-2-discipline_key2:
Responsibilities:
The disciplinary committee (DISCO) is responsible for ensuring that there is discipline on campus.
section-2-discipline_key3: Consulting with the council and come up with a time schedule for the day
section-2-discipline_key4: This includes class times, meal times, morning and evening circle and work time
section-2-discipline_key5: Ensure that all rules & regulations are laid out clearly through the use of posters
section-2-discipline_key6: Ensure that each student has signed a copy of rules and regulations to be followed
section-2-discipline_key7: Addressing any violation or rule or any misconduct by any student and take appropriate action
section-2-discipline_key8: Maintaining a public record of all cases where disciplinary action was taken
section-2-discipline_key10: Every 45 days along with the laptops reallocation, beds and rooms will be reallocated randomly amongst the students
